title: File - Stakeholders
description: JSON containing file type identifier and list of stakeholders

legal_name.description: Legal full name for the individual/institution

issuer_assigned_id.description: This might be any sort of id assigned to the stakeholder by the issuer, such as an internal company ID for an employee stakeholder

current_relationship.description: What is the current relationship of the stakeholder to the issuer?
current_relationship.title: Enum - Stakeholder Relationship Type

current_relationships.title: Stakeholder - Relationships Array
current_relationships.description: What is/are the current relationship(s) of the stakeholder to the issuer?

items.title: Enum - Stakeholder Relationship Type
items.description: Enumeration of types of relationships between stakeholder and issuer

current_status.description: What is the current activity status of the stakeholder?
current_status.title: Enum - Stakeholder Status Type

primary_contact.description: The primary contact info for an institutional stakeholder
primary_contact.title: Type - Contact Info

legal_name.description: Legal full name for the individual/institution

phone_numbers.title: Contact Info - Phone Number Array
phone_numbers.description: Phone numbers to reach the contact at

items.title: Type - Phone
items.description: Type representation of a phone number

phone_type.description: Type of phone number (e.g. mobile, home or business)
phone_type.title: Enum - Phone Type

phone_number.description: A valid phone number string in ITU E.123 international notation (e.g. +123 123 456 7890). An extension number, if applicable, should be separated by words ''extension'' or ''ext.'' after the phone number (e.g. +123 123 456 7890 ext. 100).

emails.title: Contact Info - Email Address Array
emails.description: Emails to reach the contact at

items.title: Type - Email
items.description: Type representation of an email address

email_type.description: Type of e-mail address (e.g. personal or business)
email_type.title: Enum - Email Type

contact_info.description: The contact info for an individual stakeholder
contact_info.title: Type - Contact Info Without Name

phone_numbers.title: Contact Info - Phone Number Array
phone_numbers.description: Phone numbers to reach the contact at

items.title: Type - Phone
items.description: Type representation of a phone number

phone_type.description: Type of phone number (e.g. mobile, home or business)
phone_type.title: Enum - Phone Type

phone_number.description: A valid phone number string in ITU E.123 international notation (e.g. +123 123 456 7890). An extension number, if applicable, should be separated by words ''extension'' or ''ext.'' after the phone number (e.g. +123 123 456 7890 ext. 100).

emails.title: Contact Info - Email Address Array
emails.description: Emails to reach the contact at

items.title: Type - Email
items.description: Type representation of an email address

email_type.description: Type of e-mail address (e.g. personal or business)
email_type.title: Enum - Email Type

address_type.description: What type of address is this (e.g. legal address, contact address, etc.)
address_type.title: Enum - Address Type

country_subdivision.description: State, province, or equivalent identifier required for an address in this country
country_subdivision.title: Type - Country Subdivision Code

country.description: Country code for this address (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2)
country.title: Type - Country Code

tax_ids.title: Stakeholder - Tax ID Array
tax_ids.description: The tax ids for this stakeholder

items.title: Type - Tax Identifier
items.description: Type representation of a government identifier for tax purposes (e.g. EIN) and corresponding country code (ISO-3166)

country.description: Issuing country code (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2) for the tax identifier
country.title: Type - Country Code

comments.description: Unstructured text comments related to and stored for the object

file_type.description: File type field (used to select proper schema for validation)
file_type.title: Enum - OCF File Type
